attributes.action: Increase the fixed Profit Car Scheme rates paid to private car owners for business mileage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Fixed Profit Car Scheme rates currently in force are 40p for the first 10,000 miles and 25p there after for cars and vans.
This rate has not changed for the last 5 years, however the price of petrol has increased by at least 30p per litre in this time period to date.
Also the rates paid to company car owners who pay personally for business fuel have recently increased, why has FPCS not ?
